subject: RE: 104607-Broker 9 Vs. CBNA
content: Good morning,                                   we agree to receive USD 1’796'597  with value date 07.09.2018.   Please confirm if you agree.   Thanks for your cooperation. CBNA     Please find attached portfolio statement as of 05-Sep-18 Regards, CBNA Group Email: XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx Group Tel#: +11-11-1111-1111 The information contained in this electronic message and any attachments (the \"Message\") is intended for one or more specific individuals or entities, and may be confidential, proprietary, or otherwise protected by law.
